title: Quality Polish & Advanced Features
description: Implement the advanced ideas from the insights document: automated validation, phase context chaining, retrospective command, and progress tracking. This is what elevates the project from 'useful' to 'impressive'.

context_chain.receives_summary: Complete project with docs and example — now adding polish and advanced features

ideas_implemented: Idea 6 — Parallel Frontend + Backend Tracks documentation

deliverables.description: Enhanced /validate command: checks file existence against plan, runs tests, checks lint, verifies component size limits, outputs structured pass/fail report
/retro command that analyzes the completed feature delivery: phase durations, iteration counts, common issues, improvement suggestions
/progress command that shows visual phase completion status with the progress bar format from the insights doc
Guide explaining how each phase outputs a context summary that the next phase consumes, reducing AI context loss between phases
Guide for running frontend and backend tracks in parallel with two Claude Code sessions

tasks.title: Build /validate command with quality checks
tasks.description: Enhance the validation command to check: files created match the plan, all tests pass (npm run test), lint is clean (npm run lint), no component exceeds 80 lines. Output a structured report.

tasks.title: Build /retro command
tasks.description: Create the retrospective command that analyzes git history for the feature branch: count commits per phase, identify phases with most changes, surface patterns in test failures, suggest workflow improvements.

tasks.title: Build /progress command
tasks.description: Create visual progress tracking that reads the plan file and git history to show which phases are complete, in-progress, or pending. ASCII progress bar format.

tasks.title: Implement phase context chaining format
tasks.description: Define a .phase-context.json format that each /implement writes after completion. Contains: files created, interfaces exported, types defined, test results. Next phase reads this automatically.

tasks.title: Write parallel tracks documentation
tasks.description: Document how to run frontend (Phases 1-3) and backend (Phases 4-6) in parallel using two Claude Code sessions. Include: setup, sync points, conflict resolution, merge strategy.

tasks.title: Final quality sweep
tasks.description: Review all files for consistency: naming conventions, cross-references, broken links, typos. Ensure the repo is ready for public release.

acceptance_criteria: /validate produces a clear pass/fail report for any phase
/retro generates useful insights from git history
Phase context chaining format is documented and implemented in /implement
All documentation is cross-linked and consistent
Repo is clean, professional, and ready for GitHub release
